DOC.brief_title: Kynex Versus Refresh Plus Study Subject With Dry Eye
DOC.criteria: 20 year age old , race either sex . Able understand sign inform consent approve Institutional Review Board . Criteria diagnosis must include follow two characteristic Visit 1 ( Day 1 ) : Subjects ' assessment dry eye status ( answer least `` Some time '' question , `` How often eye felt dry enough want use eye drop ? '' Sodium fluorescein ( NaFl ) corneal stain score sum â‰¥3 either eye ( NEI score system ) . Able willing follow study instruction . Subjects meet follow criterion exclude study : History evidence ocular intraocular surgery either eye within past three month . History intolerance hypersensitivity component study medication . History evidence epithelial herpes simplex keratitis ( dendrictic keratitis ) ; vaccine , active recent varicella viral disease cornea and/or conjunctiva ; ocular rosacea ; chronic bacterial disease cornea and/or conjunctiva and/or eyelid ; mycobacterial infection eye ; and/or fungal disease eye . Use topical ocular medication study period . Subjects use systemic medication may contribute dry eye ( e.g . cold allergy medication , tricyclic antidepressant , hormone replacement therapy ) may enrol study unless stable dose regimen minimum 30 day prior Visit 1 . In addition , dose regimen must remain stable throughout study . Presence ocular condition active acute blepharitis , conjunctival infection , iritis , ocular condition may preclude safe administration test article . Subjects unwilling discontinue contact lens wear study period . Contact lens wear must discontinue least one week prior Visit 1 . Current punctal occlusion type ( e.g . collagen plug , silicone plug ) . Enrollment investigator staff , family member investigator , family member investigator 's staff , individual live household individual . Participation investigational drug device study within 30 day enter study .
